metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7716 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The read_u32_leb128 function in libr/util/uleb128.c in radare2 1.3.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted Web Assembly file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-2.3 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-2').
